title: Blended Teaching Method Design for Mobile Music Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory knowledge and experience using smartphones/tablets
context.additional_context: Mobile music production and collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can create an original 3-minute music composition using the GarageBand app.
Learners can revise musical works by incorporating peer feedback through mobile-based collaboration tools.
Learners can explain strategies for creatively solving problems encountered in the digital audio production process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
